ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum lot depth 400ft. Maximum frontage: depth or depth: frontage ratio is 1:3. Maximum ADU height 25ft. If an ADU is attached to the principal dwelling, the ADU has a maximum footprint of 1,200 sf. Maximum principal dwelling footprint 5,000sf. A PUD is required in order to subdivide a given lot 7 or more times within 7 years of the first subdivision, regardless of ownership. Maximum of 1 unit per 25 acres.

ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: ADUs allowed within pre-existing residences only. District boundaries are based on the 1985 FIRM maps (including any amendments). The conversion of single family seasonal home to a single family year round home is subject to conditional use review.

1F_FSET: Min: 40ft; 100ft on Rts 22A and 73. Max: 100ft; 150ft on Rts 22A and 73
2F_FSET: Min: 40ft; 100ft on Rts 22A and 73. Max: 100ft; 150ft on Rts 22A and 73
3F_FSET: Min: 40ft; 100ft on Rts 22A and 73. Max: 100ft; 150ft on Rts 22A and 73
4F_FSET: Min: 40ft; 100ft on Rts 22A and 73. Max: 100ft; 150ft on Rts 22A and 73
ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Mobile home park is allowed under conditional use review. Minimum frontage is 200ft on Rt 22A. Minimum lot depth 100ft. Maximum lot ratio frontage: depth or depth: frontage is 1:3. Maximum principal dwelling footprint 4000sf. 3+ unit residences must have at least one accessible parking spot. A PUD is required to subdivide a given lot 7 or more times within 7 years of the first subdivision, regardless of ownership. Maximum of 1 unit per 2 acres.

1F_FSET: Min: 30; 100ft on Rt 22A & 73. Max: 100ft; 150 on Rt 22A & 73.
2F_FSET: Min: 30; 100ft on Rt 22A & 73. Max: 100ft; 150 on Rt 22A & 73.
3F_FSET: Min: 30; 100ft on Rt 22A & 73. Max: 100ft; 150 on Rt 22A & 73.
4F_FSET: Min: 30; 100ft on Rt 22A & 73. Max: 100ft; 150 on Rt 22A & 73.
ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum frontage on Rt 22A 200ft. Minimum lot depth 100ft. Maximum lot ratio (frontage to depth or depth to frontage) 1:3. Maximum principal dwelling footprint 4000sf. Maximum ADU height 25ft. A PUD is required to subdivide a given lot 7 or more times within 7 years of the first subdivision, regardless of ownership. Maximum of 1 unit per 25 acres.

ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum lot depth 200ft. Maximum ADU height 25ft. If ADU is attached to the principal dwelling, it has a maximum footprint of 1200sf. Maximum lot ratio frontage: depth 1:3. Maximum principal dwelling footprint 5,000 sf. A PUD is required for major subdivision (4+ lots) of a lot originally 50+acres OR the subdivision of a given lot 7 or more times within 7 years of the first subdivision, regardless of ownership. A re-division of any parcel that was originally part of a 50 acre lot will also trigger PUD requirements (so that any subdivision beyond 3 lots from original must be a PUD). Maximum PUD density is 1 dwelling per 7 acres.

ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum setback of 75 ft from mean high water level 'after all distances' for Lake Champlain and East Creek. Provisions include limits on vegetation removal to reduce erosion & requirements for stormwater management regarding impervious surface development.

ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum setback of 50 ft from mean high water level 'after all distances' for Sunrise Lake. Provisions include limits on vegetation removal to reduce erosion & requirements for stormwater management regarding impervious surface development.

ADU_PARK_UNITS: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
TTIPNOTES: Minimum lot depth 50ft; Maximum depth: frontage or frontage: depth ratio 1:3. Maximum principal dwelling footprint 300 sf. Maximum ADU height 25ft. It is possible to have parking requirements waived based on shared on street availability. 3+ unit dwellings must have at least one accessible parking spot. A PUD is required in order to subdivide a given lot 7 or more times within 7 years of the first subdivision, regardless of ownership. Maximum of 1 unit per 2 acres.
